title: Matterport3D: Learning from RGB-D Data in Indoor Environments
name: matterport3d
text: The Matterport3D dataset contains data captured throughout 90 properties with a Matterport Pro Camera.

title: ScanNet: Richly-annotated 3D Reconstructions of Indoor Scenes
name: scannet
text: The ScanNet dataset consists of 1513 RGBD scans in 707 real world indoor environments that have been reconstructed and semantically annotated.  The data can be used for semantic understanding tasks such as semantic labeling of voxels.

title: SUNCG: A Large 3D Model Repository for Indoor Scenes
name: suncg
text: The SUNCG dataset consists of over 45K synthetic scenes created by humans using 2K models.  The data was collected from Planner5d.

title: PiGraphs dataset
name: pigraphs
text: The PiGraphs dataset consists of 26 reconstructed RGBD scans with recorded actions and annotated interaction

title: Stanford Scene Database
name: ssdb
text: The Stanford Scene Database consists of 133 synthetic scenes created by humans.

title: ShapeNet: An Information-Rich 3D Model Repository
name: shapenet
text: ShapeNet is an ongoing effort collect and enrich 3D models with semantic information.
